name: Darüşşafaka Sports Club
description: What Is Darussafaka Sports Club Token (DSK)? Darussafaka Sports Club Token is the official fan token of the Darussafaka Sports Club, a sports club taking place in the Turkish Basketball Super League. DSK is the fan token that is used for: Enabling fans to engage and communicate with the Darussafaka Sports Club. Receiving gifts, accessing privileges, discounts, special events. How Many DSK Tokens Are There in Circulation? Darussafaka Sports Club Token launched on April 20, 2022 with 4.5 Million DSK tokens created at genesis. Currently, 4,597,177.00 DSK token are in circulation. Who Are the Founders of DSK Token ? Darussafaka Sports Club Token ($DSK) project is launched in cooperation with ExenPay, Bitexen and Darussafaka Sports Club. Where Can I Buy Darussafaka Sports Club Token (DSK)? DSK is available for trading on Bitexen, one of the largest exchanges in Turkey, available.
